long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension attempts to remove the new Twitch UI change where the title is on top of the stream instead of below the stream.

It does this by enabling a cookie that tells Twitch to revert the 'experiment'
